summary:
An experienced freelance copywriter, fluent in two languages with a proven history of executing and managing media campaigns for various clients. Started a career working for different companies (IT/crypto/copyright protection/small businesses) and international events (political/cultural/sports). Until recently worked full-time as a marketing copywriter creating texts in English and Russian, developing interactions with users, and working on expanding the presence of products on the market. Moved to Amsterdam (holding a Dutch residence permit), and am in search of a job in a company where I can make a significant contribution and realize my full potential.

Top skills:
- Creative & UX writing (English/Russian)
- Social media management
- Creation of promo campaigns
- Content creation (including interface texts, emails, and push notifications)
- User interaction

Firmly believe that team collaboration and continuous development are the basis of success.
